name: Whose Home is better?
description: Whose home is better, is a local split screen multiplayer 1vs1 game where you have to outsmart your opponent. One player will play as the poor kid and the other as the rich kid.They have a background completely opposite to one another. The rich guy and poor one have their home across the bridge. The rich guy is in the need of social life whereas the poor guy needs food and rush around for finding something to eat. They both have to cross the bridge to get to the so called better side for each of them. Both characters have to survive with the resources they have and try to fulfill their need. This game can be played by using a Keyboard and Gamepad. Controls: Player 1 (Keyboard) WASD : for movement Spacebar : Jump Left Mouse : Attack Player 2 (Gamepad) Square/X : Attack A: Jump Left Joystick: Movement Right Joystick: Camera/direction
